attributes.action: Re-think its law on the smoking ban in public places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On July 1st the government introduced a smoking ban for the whole of England. However Smokers and Owners of all establishments were not asked if it would be beneficial to them. The government has however allowed themselves to smoke in the chambers and pub of West Minster where the ban was introduced. Therefore we ask that the smoking ban be quashed with immediate effect

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
